title: Fair champs
body: Can someone explain to me why champions like Zed and LB haven't been nurfed yet when they are just cancerous to play agains

replies.body:
Ok well i must say im not being salty or anything but just curious 
Do you read patch notes or do you read any threads or post from any informative pages about league?
Many people have complained about both zed and leblanc, Riot themselves have said that in their minds they are pretty balanced or in their words 
"Healthy". Zeds q has to hit the champion first for the max dmg otherwise if it hits a minion then champion its useless xD, Zeds ult can be easily countered with a Zhonyas (i think i spelt it right ahah) or even a qss which i have been seeing lately. It also comes down to if you know how zed works and how you like to play against one. 

Leblanc on the other hand, if you allow her to roam early and not ping MIA or you team has no map awareness then she is likely just going to snipe a kill and then snowball, but if you are laning against one and find that you are taking more dmg then you should be, then reconsider how you are playing, Leblanc is a point blank range champion and you should try and stay back and hit skillshots if you have one. I do the same thing when i play zed against a lebanc, i just sit back and farm with q and poke with w and e and wait for her to be low enough for a ult opportunity. 

Both champions are fairly balanced as they are meant to be assasins, where their combo should one shot you as thats what assasins do. Its how you want to counterplay it. If you want to stay in melee range of leblanc then do it but be aware that she will combo you, if you want to engage a zed then do it but be aware he has 2 shadows he can use to move to and they also copy his abilties.

My comment is done ahah remember im not being salty just stating what i think and what riot has said about these champs

He can't dodge her full combo, only the brunt of it. Oh, he ulted to dodge your Q? W+Shunpo away and re-engage shortly since you have everything and he has either nothing or little. If you go in with everything and he ults to dodge all of your abilities then that's your own fault for playing bad.
Both suck late game. Both have counterplay. In lower levels they can stomp easily but it's difficult against people who know what they're doing.

Lb now will simply AA, then Q W you and unless you are counter picking odds are your playing a champ that cant do much.

By the time late game comes around, multiple members of your team should have items which make it stupidly difficult for either of them to do enough damage to your carries. As a carry, once you get a QSS you'll be fine against Zed unless he's either really fed or you play poorly. As an AP Champion you'll have Zhonya's and probably Rylai's (and maybe more) so there's no chance he's killing you unless you let him. As everyone else you should be tanky enough that you don't need to worry about him touching you.

Same goes for LeBlanc. There's Zhonya's, QSS, Sterak's, Maw, Banshee's, Bloodthirster, etc. Your team should also have at least 1 Locket and maybe a Crucible and Face of the Mountain. If you have to solo LeBlanc or Zed because your team either doesn't help or they're just useless, they're still beatable with Flash as long as you don't walk back into them afterwards. You can dodge every bit of their damage except Ignite, LB Q/R, Zed R and basic attacks. 

As for your point about no risk, they have plenty early. In lower levels of play they'll usually use their escape to harass or farm, which makes them easily gankable. Capitalise on any mistake you can and snowball from that. If you don't trust yourself to do that then just play safe and farm so they can't snowball off you. Once they're fed and you're alone then you're probably screwed and it's difficult to win that but it's not impossible.

A lot of what you said above requires your team to have a brain, and lets we are Oce, the odds of getting a team that even understands what team work is is slim to none. My main problem with Zed and LB is not they can't be counter or that they lack it but rather they are considered healthy by Riot while they say someone like Akali is unhealthy (before they gutted her). It's even worse now because of thunder lords as it gives both of them so much extra burst for free, mainly LB cause if you play say Akali, someone with a weak early game she can just AA you out of land now rather then having to use al her skills.

I shouldn't have to pick a certain champion to fight someone, that's why they changed Veigar's stun to a delayed over instant, so that taking an ad mid laner was not almost guarantee kill as an AP mid laner was just unfair as Veigar was almost always guarantee a kill from level 6 onward aslong as his ult was up

I think **LeBlanc** is fine right now. Her winrate is at around 45%, and she has a decent amount of counters. She might seem OP though because she snowballs really in lanes where she gets an advantage.

**Zed** is a different story. I'm getting genuinely worried. He has a quite high skill cap to play, so he shouldn't be hitting high winrates. Despite this, he's at 51.5% ATM. The scariest thing is, there's a huge item buff coming his way, with only a small nerf to compensate.

My problem with both Lb and Zed is that with  Thunderlords now a thing, if you don't take either a champion who has a really strong early game or you have to take someone like Lissandra or Annie cause then you simply stun them. Like last night i was playing a game agains a Zed as Jhin and despite being better at csing and having forced him out of lane twice the second he got 6 I just lost any control I had agains him
